trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.

Implement the IServiceContractGenerationExtension interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.

Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> prior to code generation.
The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
